description: At the FH Aachen, I gained a general education in Software Development and Mathematics.

highlights.text: Bachelor's Thesis - Analysis of the potential of a yard management software

description: At INFORM, I was involved in several projects for customers in the package service sector. In my team, we developed an intelligent software solution for distribution centers. This solution creates optimized real-time schedules to decrease the time of each package spent in the center.

highlights.text: Application to control multiple hundred of displays
Library to simplify mocking applications with propietary protocols
Simulation tool for real time yard management

description: At the RWTH Aachen, I focused on the theoratical foundations of programming languages and general software development.

highlights.text: Master's Thesis - Non-Monotonic Bound for Complexity Analysis of Integer Programs

description: I did an internship at the German University of Technology in Oman for several reasons: I wanted to explore an Arabian country and its culture, experience the teaching aspects of a university and improve my English skills. Additionally, I took the opportunity to develop the GUtech websites.

highlights.text: Assist in teaching of Programming fundamentals
Assist in teaching of Operating Systems

description: During my master's I joined the company LeiKon. LeiKon supports their customers in the process industry to increase added values of their production plants. As a working student, I developed multiple web interfaces, scripts for extraction and transformation of data and participated in the development of the main software products.

highlights.text: Integration with a serial bar code scanner

description: I am working as a senior software engineer at LeanIX. LeanIX builds software to enable companies to get and collaboratively maintain an overview of their IT landscape.

highlights.text: Conception and development of the Integration API
Fullstack development of the quick search
